description: This Kotlin source file defines data models, interfaces, and a repository class for interacting with a Question-Answering backend service in an Android app. It includes data classes for messages and requests, a Retrofit interface for API calls, and a repository class that manages service configuration and network communication.

classes.name: Role
classes.description: Enumeration of user roles in chat messages.

classes.name: Message
classes.description: Data class representing a chat message with a role and content.

classes.name: AskRequest
classes.description: Data class representing the request payload for asking a question.

classes.name: AskResponse
classes.description: Data class representing the response with an answer.

classes.name: QAService
classes.description: Retrofit interface defining the /api/ask POST endpoint for querying the backend.

classes.name: QARepository
classes.description: Class responsible for configuring and making network requests to the QAService backend.

methods.name: ask
methods.description: Suspending function that sends a question to the backend and returns the answer.
